title: Rebooter for Android Wear
summary: Reboot app for Android Wear and most other devices.
description: This app gives reboot options for Android Wear devices (mainly the watches at the moment).This app requires root!!!Currently supported devices:Android Wear Supported:*LG G Watch*Samsung Gear Live*Should work on the Moto 360 (when released).Android Mobile Support:*Most devices out.The app gives the following reboot options:*Reboot*Reboot to recovery*Reboot to bootloader*Power Off
descriptionHTML:
This app gives reboot options for Android Wear devices (mainly the watches at the moment).

This app requires root!!!

Currently supported devices:

Android Wear Supported:
*LG G Watch
*Samsung Gear Live
*Should work on the Moto 360 (when released).

Android Mobile Support:
*Most devices out.

The app gives the following reboot options:

*Reboot
*Reboot to recovery
*Reboot to bootloader
*Power Off
